ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then on the Day of Rising you will be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then will be raised up on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and then on the Day of Resurrection you shall certainly be raised up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and you will be brought back to life again on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then you will all be raised on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then (again), surely you will be resurrected on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then surely on the day of resurrection you shall be raised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then on the Day of Resurrection you shall surely be raised up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then lo! on the Day of Resurrection ye are raised (again).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then you will be raised up again on the Resurrection Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then verily on the Day of Judgment ye shall be raised up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then you will indeed be raised up on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Again, on the Day of Judgment, will ye be raised up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then (again), surely, you will be resurrected on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and be resurrected on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, on the Day of Resurrection, you will be resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:16] Then on the Day of Resurrection you shall surely be raised, for reckoning and requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then lo! on the Day of Resurrection ye are raised (again)) you will be given life again.
